ygData.subject: Re: Jewelry - what are you wearing?
ygData.msgSnippet: As chance would have it, I was surfing jewelry lists at lunchtime today, and this is exactly the list I generated for myself.  The earrings are disappointing;
ygData.messageBody:
As chance would have it, I was surfing jewelry lists at lunchtime today, and
this is exactly the list I generated for myself. The earrings are
disappointing; I wonder if this is as good as they get, or if better earrings
just haven't been discovered yet.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 34 songs, Innoruuk

JasonF wrote:
>
> From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
> This has been covered before to some degree, but I was hoping to start a
> thread on what jewelry people believe to be the best for Bards. I have a
> message to this list originally by Ryan Honeyman (Harmonic)

> [Ryan wrote:]
> face: platinum star ruby veil, cha9 dex9
> neck: golden black pearl choker, agi7 dex7
> ear: electrum sapphire earring, str4, int2
> ear: electrum sapphire earring, str4, int2
> finger: golden star ruby ring, dex7, cha5
> finger: golden star ruby ring, dex7, cha5
>
